title: Recs' for "spray-painted" face that's NOT stenciled?
content:
I'm trying to emulate this type and having a hard time finding any spray-painted typefaces that don't use stenciled letterforms. I know the type on this isn't a typeface so I'm not looking for a type ID, I'm just wondering if anybody's ever seen a spray-painted face that's more of a script or hand-lettering rather than looking like it was stenciled?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131045714im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_6503_4650.jpg)
author: Spencer Cross

comments.content:
There are a few free fonts that resemble spray-painted text at the link below:

[http://www.fontspace.com/category/spray+paint](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131045714/http:/www.fontspace.com/category/spray+paint "http://www.fontspace.com/category/spray+paint")
